description: To graduate at school and than not be able to find a job in the area of your newly acquired expertise is tough. This poor boy spent four years by studying at a business school, probably picturing himself as a badass manager all that time. You can imagine his disappointment when all he was able to get was a warehouse job. Now he wanted a change and I had a pleasant surprise for him. One company was looking for a guy with business education and experience with warehouse work. He was the right person for the position. But first, the boy had to convince me that he really wanted the job. We don´t hire people easily. He didn´t hesitate for a second. I wasn´t going to stop now, I wanted to fuck him hard. You have no idea how horny I was. And neither had he.
title: Dirty Scout 153
